price: 40 Celui qui a pu créer cet être n’est-Il pas capable de ressusciter les morts ?!
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
